resources.string: Run as service in background. This may affect battery life.
Keep wifi in high performance mode in order to have less packet loss. This may affect battery life.

MoBell v0.1

MoBell is simple intercom app for Mobotix T24/T25 door stations.

MoBell does not require internet connection - it uses local tcp connection and tries not to eat battery.

MoBell is licensed under Apache-2.0 license and uses ffmpeg library internally. You can find all code on github:
Sources

Github is a nice place to add bug reports and feature requests :)
